title: Opened Chest, Bugged and got no Loot
body:
On new client. I got three key fragments and forged them into one key. I had four chests before I attempted to open a chest. I clicked open and it showed no animation, and the chest disappeared off the screen so I was confused. Reloaded page and it had taken both my chest and my key, however there was no new skin or loot from it. had Astro-naut, Blood Lord Vlad and Morgana champ shard previously. I reloaded but still nothing.

Unsure how I can prove this, I didn't take a pic of the error (my mistake) but is there any way you could tell i had a key and maybe refund the two? I'd greatly appreciate it.

replies.body: I have the same issue. I opened a few chests and got just blank skin shards, along with what I had previously.
I repaired the client twice and it now seems to be there. Odd.

same bug happened to me! 
Got nothing from opening a box, just bugged and did not show anything new

Is this only happening in the Beta Client? There have been some really weird interactions with the Loot system and the new client. Try swapping over to the Legacy Client (from login) if you haven't already, then let me know if this persists through both clients:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know what you find out.

I checked legacy client as you said, but no cigar. However, luckily a quick message with support fixed my issue. Apparently, I had received an icon, and so as the chest glitched and didn't show me what I received, I didn't take into account that it may have been an icon. It had in fact added to my account, but seeing no physical loot confused me and the glitchy chest only confused me further.

Thank you!
